Package com.oracle.tools.runtime

Interface Summary
Application<A> An Application provides a mechanism to represent, access and control an executing application process, typically managed by an operating system.
ApplicationBuilder<A extends Application<A>,S extends ApplicationSchema<A,S>> An ApplicationBuilder is responsible the creation of Applications based on ApplicationSchemas.
ApplicationConsole An ApplicationConsole provides standard out and err output facilities to an executing application.
ApplicationGroup<A extends Application<A>> An ApplicationGroup represents a collection of related Applications at runtime.
ApplicationGroupBuilder<A extends Application<A>,S extends ApplicationSchema<A,S>,B extends ApplicationBuilder<A,S>,G extends ApplicationGroup<A>> An ApplicationGroupBuilder is a builder for ApplicationGroups.
ApplicationSchema<A extends Application<A>,S extends ApplicationSchema<A,S>> ApplicationSchema defines a schema encapsulating configuration and operational settings that an ApplicationBuilder will use to realize an Application.
LifecycleEvent<T> A LifecycleEvent captures the information pertaining to an event in the life-cycle of a subject (ie: object).
LifecycleEventInterceptor<A> A LifecycleEventInterceptor provides the ability to intercept and process LifecycleEvents that occur during the life-cycle of an object.
 

Class Summary
AbstractApplication<A> An AbstractApplication is a base implementation for an Application that interally uses a Process as a means of representing and controlling the said Application, typically at the operating system level.
AbstractApplicationBuilder<A extends Application<A>,S extends ApplicationSchema<A,S>> An AbstractApplicationBuilder is a base implementation of an ApplicationBuilder.
AbstractApplicationGroup<A extends Application<A>> An AbstractApplicationGroup is a base implementation of an ApplicationGroup.
AbstractApplicationGroupBuilder<A extends Application<A>,S extends ApplicationSchema<A,S>,B extends ApplicationBuilder<A,S>,G extends ApplicationGroup<A>> An AbstractApplicationGroupBuilder is a base implementation of an ApplicationGroupBuilder.
AbstractApplicationSchema<A extends Application<A>,S extends ApplicationSchema<A,S>> An AbstractApplicationSchema is a base implementation of an ApplicationSchema.
PropertiesBuilder A PropertiesBuilder defines a set of property definitions that when realized may be used as a traditional Map of name value pair properties.
SimpleApplication A SimpleApplication is a simple implementation of an Application.
SimpleApplicationBuilder A SimpleApplicationBuilder is an ApplicationBuilder for SimpleApplications.
SimpleApplicationSchema A SimpleApplicationSchema is a simple implementation of an ApplicationSchema.
 

Enum Summary
Application.EventKind The Application Application.EventKinds.
